how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.me: ANEW is run by 3 friends with ties to Africa.
about.server: Our infrastructure is higly available and monitored 24x7
about.company: ANEW is a Cardano stake pool driving decentralisation & maximising our delegators\’ rewards.The pool\’s mission is Women Empowerment and Education in Africa. 50% of our operating revenue is given back to local communities
